info.title: Edo Talent Hunt API
info.description: A comprehensive authentication API for Edo Talent Hunt with email verification, JWT authentication, and password management.

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme

isPasswordSet.description: Whether user has set a password

otp.description: OTP for verification (required for password reset, optional for initial setup)

email.description: Email address where OTP was sent
User email address for password reset

profilePhoto.description: Base64 encoded profile photo (data URL format)

videoUpload.description: Base64 encoded audition video (data URL format)

rulesAcceptance.description: Must be true - acceptance of competition rules

promotionalAcceptance.description: Must be true - acceptance of promotional terms

contestantSignature.description: Base64 encoded contestant signature (data URL format)

guardianSignature.description: Base64 encoded guardian signature (required for contestants under 16)

ownerId.description: ID of the user who purchased the bulk registration

totalSlots.description: Total number of registration slots purchased

usedSlots.description: Number of slots that have been used/assigned

totalAmount.description: Total amount paid for all slots

participantId.description: Reference to User model when they complete registration

resolvedAt.description: When the complaint was resolved (if applicable)

lgaCount.description: Number of LGAs in the state

wardCount.description: Number of wards in the LGA

wards.description: List of wards in the LGA

wardCount.description: Number of wards in the LGA

tags.name: Locations
tags.description: Nigerian states and LGAs location data endpoints

tags.name: Bulk Registration
tags.description: Bulk registration management endpoints for purchasing multiple registration slots

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in registration number, name, or email

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in transaction reference or gateway reference

post.description: Register a new user account and send email verification OTP

201.description: Registration successful, OTP sent to email

post.summary: Verify OTP (Email verification or Password reset)
post.description: Verify OTP for either email verification during registration or password reset. The type is auto-detected based on user status.

type.description: OTP type (optional - auto-detected if not provided)

message.example: Email verified successfully. Please set your password.

otpType.description: The type of OTP that was verified

nextStep.description: What the user should do next

post.description: Set user password after email verification OR reset password with OTP. Supports both initial password setup and password reset flows.

otp.description: OTP for verification (required for password reset, optional for initial setup if email already verified)

400.description: Validation error, invalid OTP, or email not verified

403.description: Email not verified or password already set

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password, returns JWT token

401.description: Invalid credentials, email not verified, or password not set

post.description: Send password reset OTP to user's verified email address

400.description: Email not verified or validation error

post.description: Resend OTP for email verification or password reset based on user status

post.summary: Verify bulk participant OTP and create account

email.description: Email address of the bulk participant

message.example: Account created successfully. Your registration slot is already paid for!

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address of the bulk participant

totalSlots.description: Number of registration slots to purchase (all slots are for individual registrations)

message.example: Bulk registration created successfully. Proceed to payment.

get.summary: List all bulk registrations for the authenticated user
Get bulk registration details by ID

schema.description: Flexible payment response data from payment gateway

message.example: Bulk payment processed successfully. You can now add participants.

post.summary: Add a participant to bulk registration

message.example: Participant added successfully. Invitation email sent.

400.description: Validation error or no available slots

404.description: Bulk registration not found or not active

complaintType.description: Type of complaint (e.g., Technical Issue, Payment Problem, General Inquiry)

description.example: Unable to upload profile photo during registration

get.description: Check if the API is running and operational

message.example: Edo Talent Hunt API is running

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Nigerian states with their LGA counts
Retrieve all Local Government Areas (LGAs) in a specific state

totalCount.description: Total number of LGAs in the state

example.message: LGAs for Lagos state retrieved successfully

400.description: Bad request - State name is required

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific LGA including all its wards

example.message: Details for Ikeja LGA in Lagos state retrieved successfully

400.description: Bad request - State name and LGA name are required

get.description: Search for LGAs across all states by name

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

400.description: Bad request - Search query is required or invalid limit

get.description: Retrieve information about the location data cache status

isValid.description: Whether the cache is currently valid

lastUpdated.description: When the cache was last updated

stateCount.description: Number of states in the cache

post.description: Endpoint for payment gateway webhooks (Paystack, Credo, etc.)

post.summary: Save flexible payment information from frontend

parameters.name: registrationId
parameters.description: Registration ID (optional - can use userId in body or authenticated user's registration)

schema.description: Flexible payment data structure - accepts any payment gateway response

savedData.description: The original payment data that was saved

get.summary: Get authenticated user's payment transactions with filtering and pagination

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in payment reference or gateway reference

registrationType.description: Type of registration - use 'bulk' to initiate bulk registration flow

profilePhoto.description: Profile photo file (JPEG, PNG, GIF, etc.) - Max 100MB

videoUpload.description: Audition video file (MP4, MOV, AVI, etc.) - Max 100MB

nextStep.description: Next step number for registration flow

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Registration ID or User ID (both are supported for convenience)

auditionDate.description: Date for audition (must be in the future)

auditionTime.description: Time for audition in HH:mm format

auditionRequirement.description: Equipment/requirement needed for audition (accepts any requirement)
auditionRequirement.example: Custom sound system with wireless microphones

hasInstrument.description: Whether the participant has their own instrument

400.description: Validation error or audition time slot not available

parameters.description: Registration ID or User ID (both are supported for convenience)

promotionalAcceptance.description: Must be true - acceptance of promotional terms

guardianSignature.description: Base64 encoded guardian signature (required for contestants under 16)
